channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Fed’s expected rate cut today is less about stimulating the economy and more about protecting the job market from ‘shattering’
item.description: A cut is something of an "insurance policy against a shattering of the U.S. labor market," UBS chief economist Paul Donovan said.

item.title: Exclusive: U.S. businesses are getting throttled by the drop in tourism from Canada: ‘I can count the number of Canadian visitors on one hand’
item.description: Canadians traditionally make up the largest group of international tourists to the U.S.

item.title: Activist investors are disproportionately targeting female CEOs—and it’s costing corporate America dearly
item.description: Also: All the news and watercooler chat from Fortune.

item.title: 5 VCs sounds off on the AI question du jour
item.description: Who better to ask about a bubble than a group who will collectively deploy anywhere from tens to hundreds of millions of dollars over the next decade ...

item.title: Machado Will Not Pick Up Peace Prize in Person, Organizers Say
item.description: The Norwegian Nobel Institute said the Venezuelan opposition leader would not be at the ceremony to collect the award despite doing everything possibl...

item.title: Trump Says Americans Are Doing Great, Even as Views on the Economy Sour
item.description: President Trump’s speech in Pennsylvania was meant to alleviate concerns about affordability. But he kept wandering off script and dwelling on his fav...

item.title: Asserting a Personal Role in Warner Bros. Battle, Trump Seeks to Expand His Powers Again
item.description: The move comes as the Supreme Court also appears poised to put antitrust enforcement by the Federal Trade Commission under his control.

item.title: Inside tractor maker CNH’s push to bring more artificial intelligence to the farm
item.description: CNH CTO Jay Schroeder says using AI to improve farming is a decades-long passion. "I grew up on a family farm…so for me, it’s personal.”

item.title: 50 States, 50 Fixes
item.description: We look at climate solutions across the country.

item.title: ISIS Detention Camps Pose a Dangerous Problem for Syria’s Leaders

item.title: Map: 5.5-Magnitude Earthquake Shakes Colombia
item.description: View the location of the quake’s epicenter and shake area.

item.title: House Democrat Seeks to Impeach RFK Jr. for Undercutting Public Health

item.title: Khmer Rouge-Era Land Mines Have a Big Role in Thailand-Cambodia Conflict
item.description: Thailand says ordnance replanted by Cambodia has injured or maimed more than a dozen of its soldiers. Cambodia rejects the accusation.

item.title: Machado Will Not Pick Up Peace Prize in Person, Organizers Say

item.title: The Territorial Sticking Point Between Russia and Ukraine
